languages.text: "Не позволь своему змеиному языку изречь скверну сомнения в словах воина Всеотца. И тебе будет позволено носить его дальше".
"Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."
languages.original_text: "Не позволь своему змеиному языку изречь скверну сомнения в словах воина Всеотца. И тебе будет позволено носить его дальше".

traits.locale_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

languages.text: “如果你还想保住你那污秽的毒蛇之舌，就闭上嘴，不要质疑全父战士的话。”
languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: “如果你还想保住你那污秽的毒蛇之舌，就闭上嘴，不要质疑全父战士的话。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Réfrénez votre langue de serpent de remettre en question les paroles du guerrier du Père de Tous, et vous pourrez peut-être la garder. »
languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: « Réfrénez votre langue de serpent de remettre en question les paroles du guerrier du Père de Tous, et vous pourrez peut-être la garder. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Mientras esa lengua viperina no empiece a poner en duda las palabras de un guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas, podrá conservarla».
languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras esa lengua viperina no empiece a poner en duda las palabras de un guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas, podrá conservarla».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「その嘘まみれのヘビの舌で、全知の父の戦士を示す言葉を口にするな。きちんと飼い慣らしておけ」
languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: 「その嘘まみれのヘビの舌で、全知の父の戦士を示す言葉を口にするな。きちんと飼い慣らしておけ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst Eure Schlangenzunge nicht den Makel des Zweifels auf die Worte des Kriegers des Allvaters spucken, dann dürft Ihr sie behalten."
languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Eure Schlangenzunge nicht den Makel des Zweifels auf die Worte des Kriegers des Allvaters spucken, dann dürft Ihr sie behalten."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

languages.text: "O yılan dilinle Yücebaba'nın savaşçısına karşı şüpheli kelimeler kusayım deme. Aksi takdirde dilini koparırırım."
languages.original_text: "Do not let your serpent's tongue spew the taint of doubt upon the words of the Allfather's warrior, and you will be allowed to keep it."

traits.locale_text: "O yılan dilinle Yücebaba'nın savaşçısına karşı şüpheli kelimeler kusayım deme yoksa dilini koparırırım."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
